job_tasks.phrase: Designing and developing key front-end components of our products.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation of software components, which falls under the umbrella of Software Development.
Implementing functions related to an API specification (OpenAPI) is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: creating a blueprint for the future
job_tasks.justification: Creating a blueprint for future development implies architectural design and planning, which is part of software development.
Code review is an integral part of the software development lifecycle.
Assisting testers is a supporting role in the software development and quality assurance process.
This phrase indicates a need to comprehend what users require from the product, which is a key aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: have an eye for design and can implement UI functionality that is visually pleasing.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies both aesthetic judgment and the practical ability to implement a desired outcome, suggesting problem-solving in design and implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Tridion provides the services and software which empower global organizations to single-source high-value content, share, reuse and personalize content in various output formats and in multiple languages across global markets.
job_tasks.justification: This paragraph describes the business domain and value proposition of the company's products, indicating a need for the developer to understand this context.

job_tasks.phrase: Through efficiency gains, our customers are able to speed up the time of information going to global markets, drive down the cost of content development and translation, provide more agility for the overall business, and increase customer satisfaction through access to better information.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence details the business benefits and customer outcomes, further emphasizing the need for business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Working closely with the interaction designers.
have an eye for design and can implement UI functionality that is visually pleasing.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on frontend development tasks using React, Redux, and ReactQuery. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or any related technologies or concepts that would align with the GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer profiles.
